name: Mad Motorcross King! Extreme Dirt Bike Stunt Trial
name_original: Mad Motorcross King! Extreme Dirt Bike Stunt Trial
description:
Ride your bike and experience FUN and CHALLENGING obstacles!

Guide the bike up the dangerous ledges, jump high and low to reach the goal.

Can you complete all levels?
Can you earn all the medals and complete the game?

Simply ride your way and collect all the coins as you maneuver your way over obstacles.

A definite FAST PACED bike racing game, you and your kids will surely love!
Spend time with your family and friends while enjoying the game!

A PRETTY COOL game for all the bikers!

Game Features:
> Game for all ages
> Awesome stunts
> Cool sounds
